name: Let's Sing 2017
description:
Pick your hit, grab your friends, Let’s Sing! Featuring 30 of the latest chart topping hits and a variety of unique game modes, “Classic”, “Duet”, “By Heart” and “Pass The Mic”. Sing solo or get the party started with up to 8 players.

• Expand your track list by via the new online store which offers various new song packs for you to purchase
• Use your Smartphone as microphone and jump into the game quick and easy! Download the Let’s Sing Microphone companion app for iOS (iOS 7 or later) and Android (4.0 or later) Smartphones
• Participate in all game modes at any time by singing against up to 3 computer opponents
• Let’s Sing 2017 features the original HD music videos of your favorite artists. Sing along to them or watch and listen to the full playlist via the in-game Jukebox
• Get the Party started and play Let’s Sing 2017 with up to 8 Players
• Compete with your friends and even make it to the Top 3 worldwide on the online leaderboards of Let's Sing 2017
